instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..
definitions.820-3209: What is 820-3209? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message:
I got a dead macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a because of a water damage. The customer told me that after he putting it for a while on the rice, he has started it to take a important file from it, then he brought it to me.
By trying to dry it he lifted most of the kies of the keyboard. He told me that it was still working.

After checking it by the microscope, I ve found nothing strange on the board, no corrosion or calcination of componant. Just some water traces I ve cleaned with the alcohol and tooth brush.

I tried to boot it by pressing the PB, but nothing is happening. I ve no schematics of this model, but I could read a 3V3 on one of the coils.

Please any idea.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message:
Light on the charger? Does it boot up when plugging in the charger with the keyboard and battery disconnected?

Get schematics first, then we'll try to help.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message: [USER="289"]smiba[/USER]. It boots up when plugging in the charger without keyboard and battery connected. I ve found the schematics but the BV is only from another <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> model boards available like <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message: So the board works without KB? Probably bad trackpad flex and/or keyboard.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message: [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  I ve got the BV too, how to check that the keyboard is defective?

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message:
[QUOTE="LaptopRepair, post: 27829"][USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER] I ve got the BV too, how to check that the keyboard is defective?[/QUOTE]

Try a working one.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a water damage not powering
threads.message: Just disconnect keyboard from trackpad and connect a working one there for test...
